This website uses cookies

We use cookies to personalise content and ads, to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. We also share information about your use of our site with our social media, advertising and analytics partners who may combine it with other information that you’ve provided to them or that they’ve collected from your use of their services. Learn more

  • Required to run the website
  • Monitoring website usage and optimizing the user experience
  • Evaluation of marketing actions
  • Storage of your preferences from previous visits
  • Collecting user feedback to improve our website
  • Recording of your interests in order to provide customised content and offers

Collection Propensity

Life is change. Someone’s credit score might have been excellent at the point of credit approval, but the situation can change overnight.
In order to minimize operational risks and bad debt, companies need to continuously follow-up and act on changes in customers’ consumption patterns and outstanding debt in a timely manner. Collection propensity models support companies’ ability to deliver personalized treatment to active debtors and employ the most effective collection strategy for each individual debt case.
Call us now to find out more how we can help you improve your collection results.
Benefits of a Collection Propensity predictive model:

Proactively identify customers at-risk

Minimize losses and bad debt

Decrease legal actions and collection expenses

Increase customer loyalty by adequately addressing risks
